mapper.select: SELECT b.org_code as orgcode , c.exe_csqn AS labno,-- 检验单号 c.his_item_name AS labname,-- 送检项目名称 b.sample_type AS democode,-- 样本编号 d.dict_name AS demoname,-- 样本名称 '' AS syh,-- 住院唯一编号 b.patient_id AS blcode,-- 住院病历号 '2' AS labtype,-- 送检类别 1，细菌 2 其他 date_format( b.sample_reach_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) AS labdate -- 送检日期 FROM lis_test_reg b LEFT JOIN lis_dictionary_detail d ON d.type_code = 'LIS_SAMPLE_TYPE' AND d.dict_code = b.sample_type AND d.org_code = b.org_code LEFT JOIN lis_test_reg_his_item_detail c ON b.reg_id = c.reg_id AND b.org_code = b.org_code WHERE b.patient_type = 'I' AND b.org_code = #{map.Hoscode} and c.exe_csqn is not null and c.exe_csqn <> '' AND b.get_sample_date >= str_to_date( #{map.beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) AND b.get_sample_date <= str_to_date( #{map.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) AND b.sample_reach_time is not null
